spells.name: Acidic Spray
spells.description: 1d6/level acid damage plus 1 round of acid.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique III
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge monstrous humanoid.

spells.name: Undead Anatomy II
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large undead.

spells.name: Vermin Shape II
spells.description: As vermin shape, but Tiny or Large.
